name: Arkanoid Mono
description:
Arkanoid MONO - an (almost) classical arcade!

Pretty easy and fast gameplay, right from the past with features of future!

Game currently in development, but can offer you:

  • 3D reborn classic gameplay
  • realtime physics
  • unstoppable AI that will change your game pretty fast!

ver 0.3a

by Alexander Korolevich
